0.text: Innate: Ryze increases his  maximum mana by (6% per 100 AP).
0.html: Innate: Ryze increases his  maximum mana by (6% per 100 AP).

maximum mana

0.text: Passive: Ryze's other basic ability casts reset Overload's  cooldown and charge a  Rune stack for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 2 times.
0.html: Passive: Ryze's other basic ability casts reset Overload's  cooldown and charge a Rune stack for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 2 times.
markedPassages: cooldown

1.text: Active: Ryze unleashes a runic blast in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and consumes all  Rune stacks.
1.html: Active: Ryze unleashes a runic blast in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and consumes all Rune stacks.
markedPassages: Rune

2.text: If Ryze consumed 2 stacks, he gains  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
2.html: If Ryze consumed 2 stacks, he gains  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

3.text: Flux Bonus: Overload deals 10 / 40 / 70 / 100% (based on  Realm Warp's Rank)  increased damage and spreads to surrounding Fluxed enemies.
3.html: Flux Bonus: Overload deals 10 / 40 / 70 / 100% (based on Realm Warp's Rank) increased damage and spreads to surrounding Fluxed enemies.

10 / 40 / 70 / 100% (based on Realm Warp's Rank)

0.text: Active: Ryze seizes the target enemy, dealing magic damage and  slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ryze seizes the target enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: Flux Bonus: The target is  rooted instead of  slowed.
1.html: Flux Bonus: The target is rooted instead of slowed.
markedPassages: Flux
rooted
slowed

0.text:
Active: Ryze projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals magic damage.
The target and surrounding enemies are also marked with Flux for 3 seconds. Ryze's basic abilities against Flux targets consume the mark to become empowered with an additional effect.
0.html:
Active: Ryze projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals magic damage.

The target and surrounding enemies are also marked with Flux for 3 seconds. Ryze's basic abilities against Flux targets consume the mark to become empowered with an additional effect.

Flux

1.text: Active: Ryze  channels for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining  sight of the area. Ryze is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is  interrupted.
1.html: Active: Ryze channels for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining sight of the area. Ryze is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is interrupted.

sight
interrupted

2.text: Upon completion, Ryze and allied units within will  blink to the location and become  rooted,  disarmed,  silenced and  untargetable for 0.75 seconds.
2.html: Upon completion, Ryze and allied units within will blink to the location and become rooted, disarmed, silenced and untargetable for 0.75 seconds.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+240 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if they are a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+400 health
+400 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: This item gains 20 bonus health, 20 bonus mana, and 4 ability power every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 bonus health, 200 bonus mana, and 40 ability power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18) and increase all effects of Eternity by 50%.
Unique – Eternity: Restore mana equal to 7% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions, and heal for an amount equal to 25% of mana spent, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second. For every 200 healing or mana restored this way, gain 35% bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE: This item gains 20 bonus health, 20 bonus mana, and 4 ability power every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 bonus health, 200 bonus mana, and 40 ability power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18) and increase all effects of Eternity by 50%.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  415

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+10 ability haste
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability power equal to 1% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if they are a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability power equal to 1% bonus mana.

Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
